tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE threat_intelligence_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source VARCHAR(255),
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    indicator_value TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE threat_intelligence (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name VARCHAR(100),
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_team (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(100),
    team_lead VARCHAR(100),
    team_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE sharing_platform (
    platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name VARCHAR(100),
    platform_type VARCHAR(50),
    access_level VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE shared_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shared_by VARCHAR(100),
    shared_with VARCHAR(100),
    shared_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Indicators (
    indicator_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    type TEXT,
    actor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES ThreatActors(actor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    incident_id INT,
    org_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Incidents(incident_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES Organizations(org_id)
);
